item.title: CVE-2024-34823|2024-06-06T19:14:25.951Z -- kiboko%20labs -- arigato%20autoresponder%20and%20newsletter
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Kiboko Labs Arigato Autoresponder and Newsletter.This issue affects Arigato Autoresponder and Newsletter: from n/a through 2.7.2.3.
